sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù, dànshì tài wǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux y aller, mais c'est trop tard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to go, but it's too late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shù shàng yǒu hěn duō niǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup d'oiseaux dans l'arbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many birds in the tree.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàge nánrén shì shéi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qui est cet homme ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Who is that man?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǒu wèntí suíshí lái zhǎo wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Si tu as un problème, viens me voir à tout moment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If you have any questions, come find me anytime.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le liǎng tiáo yú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté deux poissons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought two fish.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī wǎn mǐfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi un bol de riz, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a bowl of rice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liàng chē yào shí wàn kuài qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette voiture coûte cent mille yuans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This car costs one hundred thousand yuan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shuāng xié hěn shūfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces chaussures sont très confortables.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These shoes are very comfortable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīgòng duōshǎo qián?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Combien ça coûte en tout ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How much is it in total?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiānqì yuèláiyuè rè le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps devient de plus en plus chaud.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is getting hotter and hotter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīzhí zài xué Zhōngwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il apprend le chinois depuis toujours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has been learning Chinese all along.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hē chá huò kāfēi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu veux du thé ou du café ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you want tea or coffee?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan lǜsè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime le vert.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like green.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Píngshí wǒ bā diǎn qǐchuáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: D'habitude, je me lève à huit heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Usually, I get up at eight o'clock.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié hǎn le, wǒ tīng de jiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Arrête de crier, je t'entends.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Stop shouting, I can hear you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yàopiàn měitiān chī liǎng cì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce médicament se prend deux fois par jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Take this medicine twice a day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuìjìn gōngzuò tǐng hǎo de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le travail se passe bien ces derniers temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Work has been quite good recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 晚上可以看到很多星星。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǎnshang kěyǐ kàndào hěn duō xīngxīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On peut voir beaucoup d'étoiles le soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You can see many stars at night.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā huì shuō sān zhǒng yǔyán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il parle trois langues.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He can speak three languages.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yòng bǐjìběn diànnǎo gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je travaille sur un ordinateur portable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I work on a laptop.
